phrs.translation: 平稳快捷地；[口]不费力地；[口]（尤指钱）大量地

sentences.sentence: They can all be made in minutes by even the most ham-fisted of cooks.
sentences.translation: 即使是最笨手笨脚的厨师也能在几分钟之内把它们做好。

sentences.sentence: He had the reputation of being one of the most tight-fisted and demanding of employers.
sentences.translation: 人们都知道他是最抠门、要求最苛刻的雇主之一。

sentences.sentence: But the problem isn't just tight-fisted Banks.
sentences.translation: 但问题不仅仅只在于银根紧锁的银行。
